text: The Rashtriya Jankranti Morcha (abbreviated as RJM; translation: National People's revolution Front) is an Indian political party based in the state of Jharkhand. The party was founded in 2011. Rashtriya Jankranti Morcha (RJM) is a registered political party through Election Commission of India. Their are 37 unrecognized registered political parties in the state of Jharkhand which will also contest Jharkhand assembly election in 2024. Also Rashtriya Jankranti Morcha (RJM) contested 1 seat from Chatra Lok Sabha constituency in 2014. == Formation == Rashtriya Jankranti Morcha was formed on November 27, 2011. == References == == Other websites == * Performance of Registered Unrecognised Parties * List of Political Parties Participated in 16th Lok Sabha Elections, 2014 * Unrecognized political parties in Jharkhand contest elections commission released the list * Unrecognised so what 37 parties in Jharkhand poll fray Category:Political parties in India Category:Jharkhand
title: Rashtriya Jankranti Morcha
